title: And on Every Side Are Columns of Basalt, . . . the Light Falls from the Vaulted Roof (Et partout ce sont des colonnes de basalte, . . . la lumière tombe des voutes) (plate V) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
